entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 9:53 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wet flurries near the Cariboo mountains in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
